entry.title: Proposal: Requiring a miner's signature in the block header
entry.summary: There are possibilities of decentralised pooled mining, which can be achieved by chipping away at getblocktemplate support. This can help in working on mining decentralisation. The contradiction can be resolved and a better path can be adopted. The blog post titled "Mining Decentralisation - The Low Hanging Fruit" highlights some of the measures that can be taken to achieve this goal.
